full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI RJES GNANG GI CHO GA BYIN RLABS MYUR 'JUG CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI RJES SU GNANG BA'I @010A *, ,CHO GA BYIN BRLABS MYUR 'JUG CES BYA BA 'DI NI LUNG SDE SNOD GSUM LA MKHYEN PA'I RGYAS SHING MNGON RTOGS BSLAB PA GSUM GYIS RGYUD PHYUG SLOB DPON RIN PO CHE DBU MDZAD AER TE NI CHOS KYI BZHED LA BRTEN NAS, ,KHYAD PAR BDAG DANG BDAG 'DRA BA LA YANG PHAN PA'I RE BA BSAM PA KUN NAS BSLANGS TE, RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I RING LUGS PA CHEN PO BKA' DRIN MTSUNGS  MED MKHAS SHING GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG RIGS BRGYA KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHABS KYI RDUL SPYI BOR LEN PA RJE DAM PA DE NYID KYI BKA' DRIN GYIS NYE BAR 'TSO BA'I, SLOB MAS THA SHAL SHI RI KE THU CHOS RJE BLO BZANG ZHI BAS RJE BLA MA'I GSUNG GZHIR BZUNG, ,ZHAL NAS THOS PA'I MAN NGAG GIS RGYAN TE SUG BRIS PA'I DGE BA 'DIS, ,RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I RDO RJE THEG PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
